attributes.action: Automatic by-election for any MP who leave their party
attributes.additional_details: Thereby depriving the electorate a voice in deciding whether they still wanted those MPs to represent them in Parliament. It should be law that if an MP leaves their party they should automatically stand in a by-election
attributes.background: On the 18.02.2019 seven MPs left their party, but did not resign their seat and put themselves forward for a by-election.
